comment.author: 8293801@N07
comment._content: KFBE = Köln-Frechen-Benzelrather Eisenbahn. This private railway was later split up among HGK = Häfen und Güterverkehr Köln (freight operations) and KVB = Kölner Verkehrsbetriebe (passenger operations, light rail).

comment.author: 52581810@N02
comment._content: Apparently a steam engine built for the regional KFBE near Cologne. The main line of this company is now part of the regional light rail system between Cologne and Bonn.
